## Overview

It computes the graph-specific range of conditiona autoregressive (CAR) model spatial dependence parameters and displays model-based correlations between a selected seed node and all other nodes.

<https://hnaganob.shinyapps.io/car-dependence-parameter-diagnostics/>

## Aims

-   Demonstrates how triadic structures influence spatial autocorrelation patterns by cubic and hexagonal lattices.

<br>
